Player History
Injured on 4/12/1968 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1976...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 2/20/1976 (Going to SF: 2B M. Eden. Going to CIN: P J. Howell)...
Earned first career win on 5/13/1982...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/19/1984 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/2/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/9/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
